description: These species needed for the 2 product SOA scheme

pmc-data.name: ISOP-P1
pmc-data.description: gas-phase product from isoprene oxidation by OH
notes: using diffusion coefficient from dry deposition

pmc-data.name: ISOP-P2
pmc-data.description: gas-phase product from isoprene oxidation by O3
notes: using diffusion coefficient from dry deposition

pmc-data.name: TERP-P1
pmc-data.description: gas-phase product from monoterpene oxidation by OH
notes: using diffusion coefficient from dry deposition

pmc-data.name: TERP-P2
pmc-data.description: gas-phase product from monoterpene oxidation by O3
notes: using diffusion coefficient from dry deposition

pmc-data.name: PM_phob
pmc-data.note: Using C30H54 for molecular weight. TODO find best surrogate

pmc-data.name: PM_phil
pmc-data.note: Using C18H36O2 for molecular weight. TODO find best surrogate

pmc-data.name: ISOP-P1_aero
pmc-data.description: First isoprene SOA species in 2-product scheme
note: Using ketopropanoic acid for molecular weight. TODO find best surrogate
TODO update SIMPOL parameters based on MW of new surrogate

pmc-data.name: ISOP-P2_aero
pmc-data.description: Second isoprene SOA species in 2-product scheme
note: Using oxalic acid for molecular weight. TODO find best surrogate
TODO update SIMPOL parameters based on MW of new surrogate

pmc-data.name: TERP-P1_aero
pmc-data.description: First monoterpene SOA species in 2-product scheme
note: TODO update SIMPOL parameters based on MW of new surrogate

pmc-data.name: TERP-P2_aero
pmc-data.description: Second monoterpene SOA species in 2-product scheme
note: Using 2-methyl-5-carboxy-2,4-hexodienoic acid. TODO find best surrogate
TODO update SIMPOL parameters based on MW of new surrogate
